#summary Explains how to use depend_metrics.

= Introduction =

*Depend metrics* is a tool made for dependency [http://www.objectmentor.com/resources/articles/oodmetrc.pdf metrics] computation.

There are 7 computed metrics for each module:
 * *Number of efferent dependencies*
 * *Number of afferent dependencies*
 * *Number of classes*
 * *Number of abstract classes*
 * *Abstractness*
 * *Instability*
 * *Distance*
